description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are the Pie Sweeper. Your objective is to collect as many Pies as possible. But be wary - a new Orb enemy appears every time you collect a Pie! If you hit even one Orb, you lose! The full game of Pie Collect features Local Multiplayer, Unlockable Characters, Customizable Options, Single Player Statistics, an original soundtrack and a seriously addictive game at that! Enjoy!
